title: Trump to unveil opioid plan with death penalty for dealers
text:
White House to reveal opioid plan seeking death penalty for dealers 9:51am GMT - 01:18 
U.S. President Donald Trump to seek death penalty for some drug dealers as part of his long-awaited plan to tackle America's deadly opioid addiction epidemic, which claims tens of thousands of lives due to overdose every year. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The White House says new plans to fight America's opioid crisis will seek the death penalty for some drug dealers and push the Justice Department to aggressively go after criminally negligent doctors. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2poEB6b
